methods.name: project_path
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ReportErrorsServiceClient.project_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified project resource name string.

methods.name: match_project_from_project_name
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ReportErrorsServiceClient.match_project_from_project_name
methods.description: Parses the project from a project resource.

params.name: service_path
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host.

params.name: port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host.

params.name: channel
params.description: A Channel object through which to make calls.

params.name: chan_creds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

methods.name: report_error_event
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ReportErrorsServiceClient#report_error_event
methods.description:
Report an individual error event.

This endpoint accepts either an OAuth token, or an API key for authentication. To use an API key, append it to the URL as the value of a +key+ parameter. For example:

POST https://clouderrorreporting.googleapis.com/v1beta1/projects/example-project/events:report?key=123ABC456

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/error_reporting/v1beta1/report_errors_service_client"

ReportErrorsServiceClient = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::V1beta1::ReportErrorsServiceClient
ReportedErrorEvent = Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::ReportedErrorEvent

report_errors_service_client = ReportErrorsServiceClient.new
formatted_project_name = ReportErrorsServiceClient.project_path("[PROJECT]")
event = ReportedErrorEvent.new
response = report_errors_service_client.report_error_event(formatted_project_name, event)

params.name: project_name
params.description: [Required] The resource name of the Google Cloud Platform project. Written as +projects/+ plus the Cloud Platform project ID[https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/6158840]. Example: +projects/my-project-123+.

params.name: event
params.description: [Required] The error event to be reported.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
